name: Gregory Baltoro 65 Backpack - Men's
description: A tried and tested pack, sized for backpacking and gear-intensive multi-sport weekends. The Response A3 suspension adapts to your body and maintains your centre of gravity through shifting terrain for a smooth, comfortable stride. Multi-density foam in the hipbelt and shoulder straps place padding exactly where you need it, and removable lumbar foam lets you adjust the contour of the back panel. The ventilated back helps you keep your cool, while the removable rain cover protects your gear when the clouds move in. When you’ve set up camp, remove the integrated hydration bag and use it as an ultralight daypack for summit bids and scrambles.7075 aluminum wire frame is wishbone-shaped to channel the load to the centre and lumbar regions.Removable foam lumbar shim lets you customize lower-back contouring.Bottom sleeping bag compartment has a removable internal divider.Twin side-mounted water bottle holsters are canted for easy access and stow away when not needed.Internal hydration reservoir sleeve has a pocket and mesh shoulder straps so you can use it as an ultralight daypack.Lots of pockets on the front, sides and lid keep you organized.Removable shockcord loops hold ice axes or trekking poles.Removable, adjustable straps attach at multiple points for lashing on sleeping pads.Maximum recommended cargo weight is 23kg.
